topic.title: Oracle Solaris: Starting the Web Service With SMF

body.p: On Oracle Solaris hosts, the web service daemon is integrated into the SMF framework. You can change the parameters, but do not have to if the defaults below already match your needs:
body.pre: svccfg -s svc:/application/virtualbox/webservice:default setprop config/host=localhost svccfg -s svc:/application/virtualbox/webservice:default setprop config/port=18083 svccfg -s svc:/application/virtualbox/webservice:default setprop config/user=root
body.p: The table in showing the parameter names and defaults also applies for Oracle Solaris. The parameter names must be changed to lowercase and a prefix of config/ has to be added.
